messages.title: OUR MP'S RECORD ON EUROPE:
messages.content: Campaigning and voting record on Europe related issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Criticism of the current MP's record on Europe including campaign alignment with far-right UKIP, handling of Brexit, and voting against amendments favouring the NHS and preventing the UK from becoming a tax haven.

issues.brexitEurope: Campaigning with far-right UKIP and handling of Brexit-related issues.
issues.governance: Voted against amendments to prevent the UK from becoming a tax haven after Brexit.
issues.health: Voted against giving the NHS the extra cash promised in the Brexit campaign.

images.caption: Leaflet criticizing the current MP's record on Europe and Brexit.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is aimed at highlighting the negative record of the current MP with a focus on Europe and Brexit-related issues to persuade voters in Vauxhall to vote for the Liberal Democrats.
